content: zig zag baby blanket notions size 8 circular knitting needles 32 to 40 2 stitch markers darning needle for finishing crochet hook for border size h yarn caron pound of yarn 16oz 812 yards note my blanket used almost the entire skein 55 repeats + camel stitch border cast on in multiples of 8 stitches + 3 stitches 123 stitches note i used the chinese waitress cast on method video link https //www youtube com/watch v=ha1mriiqy9i abbreviations * = repeat k = knit pm = place marker chain = chain rs = right side p = purl sm = slip marker half_double_crochet = half double-crochet ws = wrong side sl1 = slip 1 stitch setup row rs sl1 pm p1 k3 p1 * pm k1 note always slip the first stitch at the beginning of the row in front of the marker and k the last stitch after the 2nd marker at the end of the row repeat the following 4 row 55 times ws row 1 s1 sm p1 k1 p5 k1 p1 * to last stitch sm k1 rs row 2 s1 sm k2 p1 k3 * to last 4 stitches end with p1 k2 sm k1 ws row 3 s1 sm p3 k1 p1 k1 p5 * to last 7 stitches end with k1 p1 k1 p3 sm k1 rs row 4 sl1 sm p1 k3 p1 * to last stitch sm k1 end with a row #4 bind off loosely note i used the super stretchy bind off video link https //www youtube com/watch v=c-gqite8qt8 crochet border options #1 shell border row 1 single_crochet around entire blanket row 2 4 double_crochet shell in same stitch skip 3 stitches * #2 camel stitch border note i used this border video link https //www windingroadcrochet com/camel-stitch-blanket-border-tutorial/ row 1 single_crochet around entire blanket starting at a corner row 2 ch2 and half_double_crochet around entire blanket corners = half_double_crochet ch2 half_double_crochet in corner stitch join w/slip_stitch row 3 ch2 half_double_crochet in 3rd top stitch of top row roll top towards you to find it corners = half_double_crochet ch2 half_double_crochet in corner stitch repeat row 3 as many times as desired finishing weave in ends
